verses.verse: And as Jesus <S%G3855>passed<s%> by, he <S%G1492>saw<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> which was <S%G5185>blind<s%> from his <S%G1079>birth.<s%>

And his <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G2065>asked<s%> him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G4461>Master,<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> did <S%G264>sin,<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> man, <S%G2228>or<s%> his <S%G1118>parents,<s%> that he was <S%G1080>born<s%> <S%G5185>blind?<s%>

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered,<s%> <S%G3777>Neither<s%> has <S%G3778>this<s%> man <S%G264>sinned,<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> his <S%G1118>parents:<s%> but that the <S%G2041>works<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> should be made <S%G5319>manifest<s%> in him.

I <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G2038>work<s%> the <S%G2041>works<s%> of him that <S%G3992>sent<s%> me, <S%G2193>while<s%> it is <S%G2250>day:<s%> the <S%G3571>night<s%> <S%G2064>comes,<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>man<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> work. <S%G2038><s%>
As <S%G3752>long<s%> as I <S%G1510>am<s%> in the <S%G2889>world,<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> the <S%G5457>light<s%> of the world. <S%G2889><s%>

When he had <S%G5023>thus<s%> <S%G2036>spoken,<s%> he <S%G4429>spat<s%> <S%G5476>on<s%> the <S%G5476>ground,<s%> and <S%G4160>made<s%> <S%G4081>clay<s%> of the <S%G4427>spittle,<s%> and he <S%G2025>anointed<s%> <S%G1909><s%> the <S%G3788>eyes<s%> of the <S%G5185>blind<s%> man with the <S%G4081>clay,<s%>

And <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, <S%G5217>Go,<s%> <S%G3538>wash<s%> in the <S%G2861>pool<s%> of Siloam, <S%G4611><s%> <S%G3739>(which<s%> is by <S%G2059>interpretation,<s%> <S%G649>Sent.<s%>) He <S%G565>went<s%> his way <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> and <S%G3538>washed,<s%> and <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G991>seeing.<s%>

The <S%G1069>neighbors<s%> <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> and they which <S%G4386>before<s%> had <S%G2334>seen<s%> him that he was <S%G5185>blind,<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> Is not <S%G3778>this<s%> he that <S%G2521>sat<s%> and <S%G4319>begged?<s%>
<S%G243>Some<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G3778>This<s%> is he: <S%G243>others<s%> said, He is <S%G3664>like<s%> him: but he <S%G3004>said,<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> he.
<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> they to him, <S%G4459>How<s%> were <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G3788>eyes<s%> <S%G455>opened?<s%>

He <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said,<s%> A <S%G444>man<s%> that is <S%G3004>called<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G4160>made<s%> <S%G4081>clay,<s%> and <S%G2025>anointed<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3788>eyes,<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> to me, <S%G5217>Go<s%> to the <S%G2861>pool<s%> of <S%G4611>Siloam,<s%> and <S%G3538>wash:<s%> and I <S%G565>went<s%> and <S%G3538>washed,<s%> and I <S%G308>received<s%> <S%G308>sight.<s%>
<S%G3767>Then<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> they to him, <S%G4226>Where<s%> is he? He <S%G3004>said,<s%> I <S%G1492>know<s%> not.
They <S%G71>brought<s%> to the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> him that <S%G4218>aforetime<s%> was <S%G5185>blind.<s%>
And it was the <S%G4521>sabbath<s%> day <S%G3753>when<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G4160>made<s%> the <S%G4081>clay,<s%> and <S%G455>opened<s%> his <S%G3788>eyes.<s%>

<S%G3767>Then<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2065>asked<s%> him <S%G4459>how<s%> he had <S%G308>received<s%> his <S%G308>sight.<s%> He <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, He <S%G2007>put<s%> <S%G4081>clay<s%> on <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3788>eyes,<s%> and I <S%G3538>washed,<s%> and do <S%G991>see.<s%>

<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> of the <S%G5330>Pharisees,<s%> <S%G3778>This<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> is not of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> he <S%G5083>keeps<s%> not the <S%G4521>sabbath<s%> day. <S%G243>Others<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G4459>How<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> that is a <S%G268>sinner<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> <S%G4592>miracles?<s%> And there was a <S%G4978>division<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> them.

They <S%G3004>say<s%> to the <S%G5185>blind<s%> man <S%G3825>again,<s%> <S%G5101>What<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%> you of him, that he has <S%G455>opened<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G3788>eyes?<s%> He <S%G2036>said,<s%> He is a <S%G4396>prophet.<s%>

But the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> did not <S%G4100>believe<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> him, that he had <S%G2258>been<s%> <S%G5185>blind,<s%> and <S%G308>received<s%> his <S%G308>sight,<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> they <S%G5455>called<s%> the <S%G1118>parents<s%> of him that had <S%G308>received<s%> his <S%G308>sight.<s%>

And they <S%G2065>asked<s%> them, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> Is <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G5207>son,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> you <S%G3004>say<s%> was <S%G1080>born<s%> <S%G5185>blind?<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> does he <S%G737>now<s%> <S%G991>see?<s%>
His <S%G1118>parents<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> them and <S%G2036>said,<s%> We <S%G1492>know<s%> that <S%G3778>this<s%> is our <S%G5207>son,<s%> and that he was <S%G1080>born<s%> <S%G5185>blind:<s%>

But by <S%G4459>what<s%> <S%G4459>means<s%> he <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G991>sees,<s%> we <S%G1492>know<s%> not; <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> has <S%G455>opened<s%> his <S%G3788>eyes,<s%> we <S%G1492>know<s%> not: he is of <S%G2244>age;<s%> <S%G2065>ask<s%> him: he shall <S%G2980>speak<s%> for <S%G848>himself.<s%>

<S%G5023>These<s%> words <S%G2036>spoke<s%> his <S%G1118>parents,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> they <S%G5399>feared<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews:<s%> for the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> had <S%G4934>agreed<s%> <S%G2235>already,<s%> that <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> man did <S%G3670>confess<s%> that he was <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> he should be put out of the <S%G656>synagogue.<s%>
<S%G1223>Therefore<s%> <S%G5124><s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> his <S%G1118>parents,<s%> He is of <S%G2244>age;<s%> <S%G2065>ask<s%> him.

<S%G3767>Then<s%> <S%G1537>again<s%> <S%G1208><s%> <S%G5455>called<s%> they the <S%G444>man<s%> that was <S%G5185>blind,<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, <S%G1325>Give<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> the <S%G1391>praise:<s%> we <S%G1492>know<s%> that <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> is a <S%G268>sinner.<s%>

He <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G1487>Whether<s%> he be a <S%G268>sinner<s%> or no, I <S%G1492>know<s%> not: <S%G1520>one<s%> thing I <S%G1492>know,<s%> that, whereas I was <S%G5185>blind,<s%> <S%G737>now<s%> I <S%G991>see.<s%>
<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> they to him <S%G3825>again,<s%> <S%G5101>What<s%> <S%G4160>did<s%> he to you? <S%G4459>how<s%> <S%G455>opened<s%> he <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G3788>eyes?<s%>

He <S%G611>answered<s%> them, I have <S%G2036>told<s%> you <S%G2235>already,<s%> and you did not <S%G191>hear:<s%> <S%G5101>why<s%> <S%G2309>would<s%> you <S%G191>hear<s%> it <S%G3825>again?<s%> <S%G2309>will<s%> you <S%G2532>also<s%> be his <S%G3101>disciples?<s%>
<S%G3767>Then<s%> they <S%G3058>reviled<s%> him, and <S%G2036>said,<s%> You <S%G1488>are<s%> his <S%G3101>disciple;<s%> but we are <S%G3475>Moses'<s%> <S%G3101>disciples.<s%>
We <S%G1492>know<s%> that <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2980>spoke<s%> to <S%G3475>Moses:<s%> as for <S%G5126>this<s%> fellow, we <S%G1492>know<s%> not from <S%G4159>where<s%> he is.

The <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, <S%G1063>Why<s%> <S%G1722>herein<s%> <S%G5129><s%> is a <S%G2298>marvelous<s%> thing, that you <S%G1492>know<s%> not from <S%G4159>where<s%> he is, and yet he has <S%G455>opened<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3788>eyes.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> we <S%G1492>know<s%> that <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G191>hears<s%> not <S%G268>sinners:<s%> but <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> man be a <S%G2318>worshipper<s%> of <S%G2318>God,<s%> and <S%G4160>does<s%> his <S%G2307>will,<s%> him he <S%G191>hears.<s%>
<S%G1537>Since<s%> the <S%G165>world<s%> began was it not <S%G191>heard<s%> that <S%G5100>any<s%> man <S%G455>opened<s%> the <S%G3788>eyes<s%> of one that was <S%G1080>born<s%> <S%G5185>blind.<s%>
<S%G1487>If<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> man were not of <S%G2316>God,<s%> he <S%G1410>could<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3762>nothing.<s%>
They <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, You were <S%G3650>altogether<s%> <S%G1080>born<s%> in <S%G266>sins,<s%> and do you <S%G1321>teach<s%> us? And they <S%G1544>cast<s%> him out.

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> that they had <S%G1544>cast<s%> him out; and when he had <S%G2147>found<s%> him, he <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, Do you <S%G4100>believe<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of God? <S%G2316><s%>
He <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G5101>Who<s%> is he, <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> that I might <S%G4100>believe<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> him?
And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, You have <S%G2532>both<s%> <S%G3708>seen<s%> him, and it is he that <S%G2980>talks<s%> with you.
And he <S%G5346>said,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> I <S%G4100>believe.<s%> And he <S%G4352>worshipped<s%> him.

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> For <S%G2917>judgment<s%> I am <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G5126>this<s%> <S%G2889>world,<s%> that they which <S%G991>see<s%> not might <S%G991>see;<s%> and that they which <S%G991>see<s%> might be <S%G1096>made<s%> blind. <S%G5185><s%>
And some of the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> were with him <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> words, and <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, Are we <S%G5185>blind<s%> <S%G2532>also?<s%>

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, <S%G1487>If<s%> you were <S%G5185>blind,<s%> you should <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G266>sin:<s%> but <S%G3568>now<s%> you <S%G3004>say,<s%> We <S%G991>see;<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%> remains. <S%G3306><s%>
